item.description:
Here is a chance to both go somewhere new AND to a place highly recommended by a trustworth source.  Mike had a good experience here - and the new specials and all you can eat sushi bar they have as part of their re-launch sound amazing.  Check them out here:

http://www.ctmenusonline.com/hayama_japanese_restaurant.htm

 

See you in Orange!
item.why: Mike highly recommends it! They re-launched with great specials and an all you can eat sushi bar with special roll for $19.00.

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: Say Hiya to Hayama.
